system.description:
When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.Ml6muq1ZjhkuT7FF]{Speak Softly} with someone who admires or fears you, you may roll at +Grace instead of +Wisdom.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.Ml6muq1ZjhkuT7FF]{Speak Softly}, you may also ask, "What do they desire most?" regardless of the result of your roll.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value:
One of their answers is not helpful. Either they refuse to answer or they reveal a terrible truth you didn't want to hear, their choice.

One of their other answers is false.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: One of their answers is not helpful. Either they refuse to answer or they reveal a terrible truth you didn't want to hear, their choice.

system.choices:
• What can they tell us about         ?
  • What were they doing, and what are they going to do next?
  • What should I be wary of when dealing with them?
  • What do they want, and how could we help them get it?
  • What would they have us do next?
  • What do they desire most?
